known_issues: Message sending functionality not working - messages not being sent/stored

existing_features.title: Remove the gradient styling from the name text in HeroSection and replace it with a single solid color. The element to modify is the second span within the h1 tag (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[2]). Use a warm, readable color that maintains good contrast against the background.

projectName: Make gradient name text solid color
